title: Linking to query page in UI with parameters should execute the query
description:
When linking to the query page with parameters, this should execute the query.

Right now linking to:
http://localhost:8983/solr/#/singlecore/query?q=id:[*%20TO%20*]

requires you to then hit the 'Execute Query' button

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content: Form will be automatically submitted, if there is at least one parameter in the url
